extendedInfo.description: Check out our new product Call Control Home for your landline phone on Kickstarter! http://kck.st/16qAreoCommunity powered call and text message blocking.Call Control is full featured, super easy to use and is trusted by more than 5M users to block unwanted calls and texts.  With Call Control - your phone only rings when you want it to.Features:- Automatically blocks thousands of active spam callers reported by the community.- Community Blacklist stops telemarketers, debt collectors and other spam calls before they bother you.- Personal Blacklist lets you block any phone number or area code (3 entry limit in Lite version)- Reverse lookup for spam callers to find out who's calling (and it's free).- Powered by the FCC Do Not Call Registry - blocks reported offenders automatically.More Features:- Blocked Calls Don't Ring!  You choose what to do with blocked calls:     - Pickup and Hangup / Disconnect.     - Send to voicemail.     - Mute ringer.     - Call waiting blocking supported.- Personal Blacklist     - Block any phone number.     - Block any area code (i.e. 888, 800, 206).      - Wildcard blocking supported (i.e. 888-209-????)- Block text and picture messages.- Block Private & Unknown calls.- Personal Whitelist and Contacts Protection - Make sure important calls are never missed.- Online and Local Backup - backup of your personal lists so they are never lost.- Call Log Integration â Blacklist, Whitelist and Lookup right from your Androidâs Call Log.- Privacy Mode and Scheduling.- Widgets.- 100% Ad Free!  *** Thank you for making Call Control the #1 Call Blocker with over 34,000 reviews with a 4.5 star rating!!!  ******  Voted the Verizon Wireless #1 SAVE TIME App Winner Two Years Running! ***How is Call Control different than all of those other "Call Blocking" apps?When you install Call Control, you become part of a community of users who actively report spam call activity to block thousands of the most active spam callers instantly on every users phone.  We call it our Community Blacklist - and it's incredibly powerful.  Our technology analyzes massive volumes of call data and user reports to filter the spam callers while making sure your important calls are not blocked. And by reporting spam calls you receive, you contribute to making Call Control more effective for everyone.Call Control integrates with the FCC Do Not Call registry to make Call Control even more powerful to fight spam calls!Automatic Spam Blocking with the Community Blacklist.Youâd have to enter thousands of numbers into other call blocking applications to match the power of Call Control!  Call Control comes pre-loaded with a Community Blacklist that's generated from Community reports and Do Not Call complaints, blocking thousands of spam and unwanted calls / text messages right out of the box.* The free version of Call Control is a full featured app that never expires but it does contain some limitations.  You are limited to only three personal blacklist entries, a one time update of the Community Blacklist (which is still massive and an awesome feature for free!) and the scheduling feature is not available.  ** The free 14 day TRIAL offer of Call Control Pro is optional and will revert to the free LITE version upon completion.

reviews.title: Perfect!! I love this app.
reviews.comment: This is  ultimate blocker ever its works really good. And easy to use. Thank you so much for sharing this.
reviews.author: Pinay Jadulan

reviews.title: This is the app I\'ve looking for...
reviews.comment: Everyone should have this app to block unwanted calls. Credit card companlies keep calling my number looking for people that owe them money and had my number before I recycle it.
reviews.author: Casey Albert

reviews.title: Peace of mind
reviews.comment: Most people in these hard times have to make choices about what gets paid to survive.Stressed enough with unwanted calls..well this is the app to get...finally peace and quiet.LOVE THIS APP!!!!!
reviews.author: David Mashburn

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I would provide 5 stars if the scheduler would allow me to set a time that went from the evening into the next day.  For example 7 pm to 8 am.   Other than that, great program.
reviews.author: Stephen Thompson

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: This is one of those apps that I can\'t be with out it. It does what it says it will do and if you get a lot of unwanted calls then you need this app.
reviews.author: Shawn Strong

reviews.comment: It\'s a good app. So far no problems but I can only block 4 numbers at a time.
reviews.author: Lucia Guzman

reviews.title: End abuser
reviews.comment: Application works just as advertised. Blocks all the garbage calls that I do not want to hear.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Call contro extraorinaire!!
reviews.comment: Love it!!..easy to set up in less than 2 minutes. The app was effective immediately!!..i do gravyard shifts i can sleep during the day! Thank you developers i will upgrade as well!!<3
reviews.author: Julie Bjorenthun

reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!
reviews.comment: Had scheduling issue like a previous reviewer, but she must not have contacted support because they resolved the problem promptly.... no more unwanted late night or early morning calls
reviews.author: Ms Trudie O Brunson

reviews.title: Maybe a scam app
reviews.comment: I paid for the pro upgrade and never got it. Site keeps telling me to upgrade to pro. I reported this to the site and no one ever responded.
reviews.author: steve f

reviews.title: Droid 4
reviews.comment: I\'m very glad to have this app. Does exactly what it says it does. Would give 5 stars if I had all services. Can\'t afford more than I already pay for service.
reviews.author: Robert Sayles

reviews.title: I love this app
reviews.comment: I never thought in a billion years it would work so well.. Only thing i don\'t like is after 16 block message i have to erase them but after that it continues to block the calls..this app gets a A plus in my book
reviews.author: Latoya Dorsey

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Love this app. Best around and well worth the money. Stops everything i don\'t want to come through. When 4.3 was pushed out and I lost the ability to use this app I was upset. So glad they finally got it compatible with 4.3!  Keep up the good work
reviews.author: Kris Caryl

reviews.title: Works great.
reviews.comment: I\'ve try others and they don\'t work as well as this 1 does. 2 thumbs up :-)
reviews.author: Bryan Pruliere

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it was intended to do. Not too intrusive. .
reviews.author: Kristine Gordon

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: It does what I want it to do but could be perfect.  It answers and hangs up on unwanted or blocked calls. Wish it would do it without actually awaking my phone  So useful these days.
reviews.author: Welle Max

reviews.title: 5 stars
reviews.comment: Love it.i dnt have to keep changing my phone number.i can just use this app
reviews.author: Shaunti Mann

reviews.title: Love it..
reviews.comment: <3 this app!!!! I recommend it!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Amanda Salazar

reviews.title: Worked
reviews.comment: galaxy s 2. first one I tried that works against annoying girlfriends that never stopped calling.
reviews.author: Arjan Vinson

reviews.title: Good App.
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says and what I need it to do. Well worth buying the pro version.
reviews.author: A Google User
